Things continue to spiral downhill for our "hero" Perry, as circumstances out of his control force him to move from one bad situation to another-and results in his committing certain deeds that he never in a million years imagined himself doing!Â Also in this issue: Founding Fathers Thomas Jefferson, James Madison, and James Monroe lay the somewhat seedy groundwork for their twenty-four year Presidential dynasty in "The Virginia Mafia."
